name: Umbrage PROTOTYPE
description:
- A prototype for a 2D platformer, where you can propel yourself with the shotgun and glide with the umbrella canopy.

The prototype does not support saves, as it is meant to be completed in one session. From others' playtesting experience, it takes roughly 30 minutes to complete.

- Controls | (A mouse is highly recommended.)

Hit F11 or F4 to toggle full-screen.

Hit the escape key to open the settings menu.

Use WASD or IJKL to move.

Use the mouse to aim. You can toggle between 2 modes of aiming in the settings menu.

Left-click to shoot. While airborne, shooting will propel you in the opposite direction.

Right-click to deploy the canopy. You can glide by deploying the canopy above yourself.
